rule.name: CASE_APP_RandomOrder
rule.description: Used to create a random order, containing a random customer and random order items
rule.definition: = load( local!orderNum: #"_a-0000d9b9-57db-8000-9e06-010000010000_831"() & "-" & #"_a-0000d9b9-57db-8000-9e06-010000010000_831"(), load( local!customer: #"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_6410"(), local!orderDateTime: now() - ( tointeger( rand() * ri!daysOrders ) + rand() ), local!orderItems: apply( #"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_6412"( _, local!orderNum ), apply( #"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_6416"( _ ), enumerate( tointeger( random() * 10 ) + 1 ) ) ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_Order'( OrderNum: local!orderNum, PurchaserName: local!customer.ContactName, PurchaserEmail: local!customer.Email, PurchaserPhone: local!customer.OfficePhone, TaxRate: #"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_6120", ShippingCost: #"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_6222"( null ), Total: #"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_6123"( 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_Order'( OrderItems: local!orderItems, ShippingCost: #"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_6222"( null ), TaxRate: #"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_6120" ) ), OrderDate: todate( local!orderDateTime ), OrderDateTime: local!orderDateTime, CustomerOrderRefNumb: #"_a-0000d9b9-57db-8000-9e06-010000010000_831"() & #"_a-0000d9b9-57db-8000-9e06-010000010000_831"(), Status: #"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_5799"( #"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_6146" ), Customer: local!customer, ShippingAddress: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_AddressType'( Address: local!customer.ShippingAddress.Address, Country: local!customer.ShippingAddress.Country, City: local!customer.ShippingAddress.City, State: local!customer.ShippingAddress.State, ZIP: local!customer.ShippingAddress.ZIP ), BillingAddress: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_AddressType'( Address: local!customer.BillingAddress.Address, Country: local!customer.BillingAddress.Country, City: local!customer.BillingAddress.City, State: local!customer.BillingAddress.State, ZIP: local!customer.BillingAddress.ZIP ), OrderItems: local!orderItems, TrackingNumber: #"_a-0000d9b9-57db-8000-9e06-010000010000_831"() & #"_a-0000d9b9-57db-8000-9e06-010000010000_831"() & #"_a-0000d9b9-57db-8000-9e06-010000010000_831"() ) ) )
